scripts.dev:server: concurrently -k -n SHARED,SERVER -p "[{name}]" --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold" "pnpm --filter shared run watch" "pnpm --filter server run dev"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -k -n SHARED,SERVER,CLIENT -p "[{name}]" --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "pnpm --filter shared run watch" "pnpm --filter server run dev" "pnpm --filter client run dev"
scripts.build: pnpm run build:shared && pnpm run build:server && pnpm run build:client
